text: Bohdan Tomaszewski (August 10, 1921 – February 27, 2015) was a Polish sports journalist, tennis player, sports commentator, and author of several sports books. Called a “legend of Polish sports journalism”, he was a member of the Polish Writers Association, and, with his son Tomasz, worked for the television station Polsat Sport. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Polish writers Category:Polish tennis players
title: Bohdan Tomaszewski
